code: import React from'react';import{AlertCircle,CheckCircle,X,Info}from'lucide-react';import'./ErrorDialog.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ErrorDialog=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,title,message,type='error'}=_ref;if(!isOpen)return null;const getIcon=()=>{switch(type){case'success':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircle,{size:24});case'info':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Info,{size:24});case'error':default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertCircle,{size:24});}};const getIconClass=()=>{switch(type){case'success':return'error-dialog-icon success';case'info':return'error-dialog-icon info';case'error':default:return'error-dialog-icon error';}};const getDialogTitle=()=>{switch(type){case'success':return'Success';case'info':return'Information';case'error':default:return'Error';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-dialog-overlay",onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-dialog",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"error-dialog-close",onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{size:20})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-dialog-icon ".concat(getIconClass()),children:getIcon()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-dialog-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"error-dialog-title",children:title||getDialogTitle()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-dialog-message",children:message})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-dialog-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"error-dialog-btn ".concat(type),onClick:onClose,children:type==='success'?'Great!':'OK'})})]})});};export default ErrorDialog;
